MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH46 postcode area of Moreton, affecting properties in Douglas Drive, Francis Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  7:53PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and the extensive repairs required our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:41PM on 12th April 2021.
